event.title: Get The Best Online ServiceNow integration Training
event.description:
ServiceNow platform allows direct integration for software, infrastructure, products and APIs. This will enable your enterprise to transfer data from legacy systems into the platform, as well export data from ServiceNow into the applicable system.
The ServiceNow Integration Training with Supported Integration Interfaces is helpful for the users for creating as well as assigning many task in the ServiceNow from the start and end date. The integration task such as Outlook calendar, web form and many more assigned for entering the number of hours for working for the task

Course Features:

30 Days of Instructor-Led ServiceNow Training
Real World use cases and Scenarios
Practical Approach
Expert & Certified Trainers

About KBS:

KBS is one of the leading Online training providers with a decade of experience in the Online IT training Industry. We trained thousands of students and even handled hundreds of corporates clients across the world.
KBS offers the best training in the industry with industry expert trainers. Some of our on-demand courses such as ServiceNow, Business Intelligence, RPA, Blockchain, and Cyber Security.

Key Features:

Flexible Timings
Certified & Industry Experts Trainers
Multiple Training Delivery Models
Customize Course
24/7 Support
Hands-On Experience
Real-Time Use Cases
Q&A with Trainers
Job Support
Placement Assistance.
